Business.BusinessNameLine1: AMERICAN REALTY TRUST BASIC CAPITAL MANAGEMENT

ReductionExplanationStatement.Explanation: A COMBINED MINORITY AND MARKETABILITY DISCOUNT OF 35% HAS BEEN APPLIED TO THE CEDAR COMMONS LIMITED PARTNERSHIP INTEREST. THE INTEREST IN THE PARTNERSHIP IS 42% AND THE PARTNERSHIP AGREEMENT HAS SIGNIFICANT RESTRICTIONS ON THE TRANSFER OF A PARTNER'S INTEREST. THE FAIR MARKET VALUE OF THE INTEREST IS $3,1191,942. THE COMPUTED REDUCTION IS $1,117,180. THE NET FAIR MARKET VALUE AFTER THE REDUCTION IS $2,074,762.
